Added sessions 5-6-7, updated M4/M5 milestones, added blocker B-05, recalculated progress to 93%

decisions_made.rationale: PR is the governance gate — highest-leverage action to unblock deployment pipeline

next_immediate_step.details: Human must comment 'approve' on PR #2 (https://github.com/monmacllcapp/daily-progress-tracker/pull/2). After merge, deploy to Netlify via web dashboard.

Share deployed URL with testers, provide test Google account
Monitor feedback entries, prioritize bugs vs features

blockers: Netlify CLI blocked by EACCES — deployment via web dashboard
M5-4 analytics deferred — needs privacy provider selection
continuation.context_notes: All code committed (6924b2e) and pushed. PR #2 open. Default branch on GitHub is 'main' not 'master'. Working tree clean. 247 tests, 0 errors. User test Gmail: monmaclabs@gmail.com.
